name: Partners In Excellence
content: Z Empire Investments Ltd proudly announces the first electronics convention to be held in Cyprus on the 13th - 16th of November in Limassol. 250 LEADERS OF THE INDUSTRY / OVER 100 BILLION IN TRANSACTIONS/ FROM MANUFACTURER TO RESELLER, ALL GATHERED IN ONE PLACE For the first time in such conventions, Z Empire has exclusively booked a 5\* hotel by the sea to accommodate the convention and all participants, ensuring in this way that no time is wasted from your very busy schedules and enabling our team to use all areas of the hotel for the conventionâ€™s purposes. By partnering up with all key media representatives from all over the world, we ensure the promotion of your brand or company on a world wide scale in the most prestigious and classy way, since journalists from high calibre media will be covering before, during and after the event.
